column4: I've been having some trouble with my Atheros WiFi card.  Network Manager seems to disable it when I suspend my computer, and doesn't "forget" the AP's.  Therefor, if I move it tries to connect to an AP that isn't there.

I've been having some trouble with my Atheros WiFi card.  Network Manager seems to disable it when I suspend my computer, and doesn't "forget" the AP's.  Therefor, if I move it tries to connect to an AP that isn't there. Has anyone else been having this problem
I gave up on network manager and switched to wicd which does the job perfectly for me
I'm not a huge fan of wicd, but I may have to do it.  Thanks
